SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers

Class ShopController

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers.ShopController
public class ShopController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling operations related to the online shop.

      subCategory - The subcategory of the products.

    • displaySellerProducts

      public void displaySellerProducts()
      Displays a menu with a list of products associated with a specific seller. This method is intended for sellers to view and manage their products. The menu allows the seller to perform actions such as editing, removing, and viewing details of their products. Accessible only for users with the role of Seller.

    • displayProducts

      Parameters:

    • startProductPromotion

      public OperationResult startProductPromotion(UUID productId, int discount, int promoPoints, LocalDate endDate)
      Initiates a promotion for a specific product, providing a discount, promotional points, and an end date. Sellers can use this method to start promotions for their products.
      Parameters:
      productId - The UUID of the product to be promoted.
      discount - The discount percentage to apply during the promotion.
      promoPoints - The promotional points awarded during the promotion.
      endDate - The end date of the promotion.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation, indicating whether the promotion was successfully started or not.

    • addReview

      public OperationResult addReview(UUID productId, String content, int rating)
      Adds a new review for a specific product.
      Parameters:
      productId - The UUID of the product.
      content - The content of the review.
      rating - The rating given in the review.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • calculateNewCost

      public Tuple<Integer,Integer> calculateNewCost(int cost, int fidelityPoints)
      Calculates the new cost of a product after applying fidelity points.
      Parameters:
      cost - The original cost of the product.
      fidelityPoints - The number of fidelity points to apply.
      Returns:
      A tuple containing the new cost and remaining fidelity points.

    • createOrder

      public OperationResult createOrder(String email, String phone, String shippingAddress, String billingAddress, String creditCardName, String creditCardNumber, YearMonth creditCardExpiration, String creditCardCVC, int fidelityPointsUsed)
      Creates a new order with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address for order communication.
      phone - The phone number for order communication.
      shippingAddress - The shipping address for the order.
      billingAddress - The billing address for the order.
      creditCardName - The name on the credit card used for payment.
      creditCardNumber - The credit card number used for payment.
      creditCardExpiration - The expiration date of the credit card.
      creditCardCVC - The CVC code of the credit card.
      fidelityPointsUsed - The number of fidelity points used in the order.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • submitNewBookOrManual

      public OperationResult submitNewBookOrManual(int price, int quantity, String title, String description, int fidelityPoints, String isbn, String author, String editor, BookOrManualGenre genre, LocalDate releaseDate, int editionNumber, int volumeNumber)
      Submits a new book or manual product to the shop.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of the product.
      quantity - The quantity of the product.
      title - The title of the product.
      description - The description of the product.
      fidelityPoints - The fidelity points associated with the product.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book or manual.
      author - The author of the book or manual.
      editor - The editor of the book or manual.
      genre - The genre of the book or manual.
      releaseDate - The release date of the book or manual.
      editionNumber - The edition number of the book or manual.
      volumeNumber - The volume number of the book or manual.
      Returns:
      An operation result indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • submitNewITProduct

      public OperationResult submitNewITProduct(int price, int quantity, String title, String description, int fidelityPoints, String brand, String model, LocalDate releaseDate, ITCategory subCategory)
      Submits a new IT product to the shop.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of the product.
      quantity - The quantity of the product.
      title - The title of the product.
      description - The description of the product.
      fidelityPoints - The fidelity points associated with the product.
      brand - The brand of the IT product.
      model - The models of the IT product.
      releaseDate - The release date of the IT product.
      subCategory - The sub-category of the IT product.
      Returns:
      An operation result indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • submitNewLearningResource

      public OperationResult submitNewLearningResource(int price, int quantity, String title, String description, int fidelityPoints, String isbn, String organisation, LocalDate releaseDate, LearningResourceType type, int editionNumber)
      Submits a new learning resource product to the shop.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of the product.
      quantity - The quantity of the product.
      title - The title of the product.
      description - The description of the product.
      fidelityPoints - The fidelity points associated with the product.
      isbn - The ISBN of the learning resource.
      organisation - The organization related to the learning resource.
      releaseDate - The release date of the learning resource.
      type - The type of the learning resource.
      editionNumber - The edition number of the learning resource.
      Returns:
      An operation result indicating the success or failure of the operation.
